transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Boliye.
Customer: Haan ji Sadik ji baat kar rahe hain.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Ji abhi aapki call aayi thi IndiaMART team se connect kar rahi hu.
Executive: Accha mujhe mere account manager se baat karni thi.
Executive: Haan haan main account manager hi baat kar rahi hu. Sonia hi baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Accha maine isliye call kiya tha ki woh mere by lead preference mein maine jo block kiye hain location aur keyword uske baad bhi mujhe usi location aur keyword ki lead aa rahi hai.
Executive: Accha ek minute main check kar leti hu.
Executive: Ek minute hold kariyega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Accha Sadik ji aapke paas mera number toh hai na aapne mujhe WhatsApp pe bhi bheja tha kuch Sunday ke din right? Maine IndiaMART se isko call kiya toh yeh waha pe chala gaya.
Customer: Haan matlab usse call kar liya karo aap mere number se.
Executive: Hmm. Jo aapke paas WhatsApp pe bhi hai na usse aap call kar liya kare.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Aapne uh pehle toh location ki baat kar leti hu Khambhat aur Jaipur aapne kiya hua hai right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Aapne kab check kiya tha last? Jab aapko zyadatar Jaipur aur Gujarat uski lead dikh rahi thi Jaipur aur Khambhat ki.
Customer: Abhi bhi hai meri profile mein aap by lead mere category mein dekhoge tabhi milega aapko. Haan haan dekho main aapko Sadik ji ji main ji main aapko ek cheez clear karti hu. Dekho not preferred category mein add karne pe aapka lead bilkul hi aisa nahi hota ki bilkul ek bhi na aaye reduce ho jaaye hai na? Aapka yeh hota hai ki reduce ho jaata hai aana. But yeh nahi hota ki bilkul hi hat jaayegi bilkul bhi nahi aayegi yeh nahi hota hai. Toh main dekh pa rahi hu aapki abhi lead dekh rahi hu main toh pehle hi toh Gujarat ki hai aapki second Gujarat ki hai third Gujarat ki hai fourth bhi Gujarat ki hai. Matlab mujhe aath das lead dikh rahi hai jo Gujarat ki hai phir mujhe kuch lead dikhi hai sabse ending pe Khambhat Gujarat ki. Theek hai? Toh itni zyada sari lead nahi hai Khambhat Gujarat ki even aapko lagta hai ki haan yeh hai Khambhat ki nahi chahiye bilkul bhi because hota kya hai ki Khambhat se aapka registration hai hai na? Toh thoda Khambhat ki is wajah se aa rahi hai because aapka registration hai even Jaipur bhi aapne add kar rakha hai maine aapki sari ki sari lead check kar li hai abhi ki jitni abhi profile pe visible hai Jaipur ki mujhe ek bhi lead nahi dikhi. Haan Khambhat ki dikhi hai but because of registration aapki thodi waha ki lead phir dikh rahi hai but aap chahte ho toh aap usko continuously not 11 mark karte raho.
Customer: Maine keyword bhi add kiye hain woh keyword bhi. Haan keyword ka dekh leti hu keyword ka dekh leti hu main.
Customer: Ball pen ka add kiya hai metal ball pen add kiya hai uski bahut sari lead aa rahi hai.
Executive: Kaunsa add kiya aapne?
Customer: Ball pen metal ball pen woh bahut sare add kiye hain maine lekin phir bhi wohi lead sari aa rahi hai isse kya ho raha hai ki meri jo main lead hai woh nahi aa pa rahi hai.
Executive: Main samajh rahi hu jaise aapne ek metal diya hai add kiya hai nahi?
Customer: Metal ball pen bhi hogi ek phir only ball pen hoga.
Executive: Hmm. Main aapko lead bata rahi hu aap mujhe bataiyega isme se jo aapne add kya rahega ek abhi lead dekh pa rahi hu main uh quartz panna ki lead hai green aventures quartz panna ki lead hai second aapki pearl gemstone ki lead hai. Third aapki ek pendant ki lead hai ek bracelet ki lead hai ek ball pen ki lead hai metal ball pen iski baat kar rahe ho aap I guess hai na?
Customer: Haan yeh ball pen ek simple ball pen bhi likha hua hai.
Executive: Haan haan woh bhi aa raha hai simple ball pen aaya hai aur ek metal ball pen aaya theek hai? Uh iske alawa phir pendant ghumti chakra phir ball pen ka ek lead aaya haan ball pen ka thoda lead dikh raha hai ek massage roller karke bhi hai I guess woh bhi isme aa rahi hai.
Customer: Woh bhi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Aap isme se koi lead toh aise use nahi kar rahe hai na matlab aise by mistakenly use ho gayi ho lead koi?
Customer: Yani samajh nahi aaya.
Executive: Mera matlab yeh hai ki by mistakenly aap se galti se koi is cheezon se related lead use ho gayi ho jo aapne waha pe not 11 mark kiye hain aisa toh nahi hai na?
Customer: Nahi aisa toh nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm. Haan maine check kar liya aisa toh nahi hai. Theek hai aapka dekho location ka toh maine bata diya Jaipur ka lead nahi hai Khambhat ka toh thoda bahut aayega agar aap bilkul hi band karna chahte ho toh usko properly aap not 11 karte raho ki I do not deal in this location toh band ho jaayega but properly phir thoda bahut toh aayega dekho Jaipur ka band ho gaya iska thoda aa raha hai aap even khud bhi check kar lena and yeh wala jo aap issue bata rahe ho category wala inko bhi aap not 11 tabhi mark kariye. Theek hai baki main apne end se uh hamari team se aapko update kar dungi iska main bhej deti hu yaha se mail aapki profile ke liye theek hai sir?
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Haan aap isko jo maine yeh do cheeze batai ek toh Khambhat wali lead ko not 11 mark kariye aur is wale mein bhi not 11 aap mark kariye continuous jo jaise abhi jitni lead dikh rahi hai na aapko 11 sab mark kar dijiye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai then main aapko update karke iska bata dungi.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur aur toh aur kuch issues Sadik ji?
Customer: Nahi bas yahi main issue hai abhi toh.
Executive: Accha aapne mujhe WhatsApp pe kuch text kiya tha shayad isi ke regarding kiya tha kya Sunday tha uss din actually.
Customer: Haan yahi tha.
Executive: Haan haan main aise Sunday ko office off rehta hai na toh shayad aapne subah ke time text kiya tha hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan haan uss time toh so hi hoti hu main Sunday ke din thoda toh dekh nahi paayi hongi. Hmm. Haan koi baat nahi theek hai uh iske alawa aur kuch koi issue nahi hai na yeh main kara dungi aapka resolve. Okay theek hai aap continuous mark kariye phir aapka band ho jaayegi bahut kam se kam aayengi. Theek hai? And main uh ek cheez last aapke paas ek feedback jaayega regarding our this call toh aap uss pe yes kar dijiyega please theek hai sir?
Customer: Okay theek hai.
Executive: Okay baki aapko next time connect karna hoga jo woh mera WhatsApp number hai na aap seedha uss pe call kar lena.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Getting leads from blocked locations and keywords.

- Main leads are not being received.



Resolution:

- Explained how not preferred category works.

- Advised to mark Khambhat leads as not 11.

- Advised to mark category leads as not 11.

- Assured to send an update from team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send an update.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, keywords, not 11, profile
